data.name: Koatl el Defensor: Los túneles perdidos Demo
data.detailed_description:
Koatl the Defender, the Lost Tunnels is an action platform video game set in the Koatl the Defender universe, published by Codex Studio.

The Title continues the adventures of Koatl as read in the comic with a completely new story where a mysterious danger lurks below the city of San Luis Potosí and Koatl will have to go down to the lost tunnels below the city to stop it.

data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Koatl the Defender Lost Tunnels is developed by Oribe Ware games in association with Codex Studio. Koatl the defender is the property of Yair Eduardo Pérez Trujillo and is used with permission of the author.
